data.message: Why is my business page not showing up in a facebook search? It was created months ago. I've tried using your help centre but just keep getting a page not found when I click the link to tell you about this.

replies.message: Hi there. We're sorry to hear that you're experiencing this issue. If you haven't already, please visit our Help Center to report a problem with your business Page: http://on.fb.me/1PP4iBB. If your Page has disappeared, you can report it to us by using the following form: http://on.fb.me/1PP4iBz. Hope this helps. -Azaria
